def reverse(str):
    sum=0
    last=True
    while str!=0:
        if str%10==0 and last==True:
            str=str/10
            continue
        last=False
        sum=sum*10
        sum=sum+str%10
        str=str/10
    return sum

def main():
    t=0
    t=int(raw_input())
    for i in range(t):
        list=map(int,raw_input().split())
        print reverse(reverse(list[0])+reverse(list[1]))

main()
